channel.title: Random server dc's
channel.description:
[code] Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Dark ownage. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 22 at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:2785) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18295) at client.packetProcess(client.java:20577) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:321) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
why does this happen and then dc everyone on the server :\
